title: Update offer card names to match real affiliate lender brands

requirements.text: Update the display names of all 6 loan offer cards in `frontend/src/data/loanOffersData.ts` and `frontend/src/components/TopLoanOffersBanner.tsx` to match their real lender brand names as follows: (1) https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=294173&co=358739&mt=5 → display name '24/7 Credit Loan (up to $5,000)'; (2) https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=373383&co=358739&mt=5 → display name 'Wizzay (up to $5,000)'; (3) https://www.hotloanstoday.com?id=vMWPxIKBq9DH2QsDiJNtlIkIwmcF00oXN-523fdHkCM.&subId=[SUB_ID_VALUE]&subId2=[SUB_ID2_VALUE]&subId3=[clickId]&firstName=[firstName]&lastName=[lastName]&email=[email] → display name 'Hot Loans Today'; (4) https://www.honestloans.net?id=vMWPxIKBq9DH2QsDiJNtlIkIwmcF00oXN-523fdHkCM.&subId=[SUB_ID_VALUE]&subId2=[SUB_ID2_VALUE]&subId3=[clickId]&firstName=[firstName]&lastName=[lastName]&email=[email] → display name 'Honest Loans'; (5) https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20435 → display name 'NextDayPersonalLoan'; (6) https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20370 → display name 'EverdayLoans'. Ensure all 6 offers are still distributed across the TopLoanOffersBanner and category loan offer sections, and that offers (3) and (4) continue to have [firstName], [lastName], and [email] tokens substituted via `affiliateUrlBuilder.ts`.
acceptanceCriteria: The offer card linked to https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=294173&co=358739&mt=5 displays the name '24/7 Credit Loan (up to $5,000)'.
The offer card linked to https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=373383&co=358739&mt=5 displays the name 'Wizzay (up to $5,000)'.
The offer card linked to the hotloanstoday.com URL displays the name 'Hot Loans Today'.
The offer card linked to the honestloans.net URL displays the name 'Honest Loans'.
The offer card linked to https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20435 displays the name 'NextDayPersonalLoan'.
The offer card linked to https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20370 displays the name 'EverdayLoans'.
All 6 offer cards remain visible on the page (in TopLoanOffersBanner and/or category sections) after lead capture.
Links (3) and (4) still have [firstName], [lastName], and [email] tokens dynamically substituted via affiliateUrlBuilder.ts using submitted lead form data.

constraints: Do not change the affiliate URLs themselves — only update the display/lender names.
Do not remove or break the dynamic token substitution for hotloanstoday.com and honestloans.net URLs.
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding new offer cards or affiliate links beyond the existing 6.
Changing the lead capture form fields or gating logic.
Modifying the pastel color theme or layout.
